title: Anti-inflammatory pineapple and turmeric smoothie

ingredients.content: 200 g pineapple pieces (fresh or frozen), cut into pieces (2 cm)
200 g banana, frozen and cut into pieces (2 cm)
3 sprigs fresh mint, leaves only, plus extra for garnishing
300 g coconut water, plus up to 200 g extra

preparations.content: Place pineapple, banana, ice, turmeric, ginger, mint, lime, spinach, walnuts and coconut water into mixing bowl and blend <b>2 min/speed 10<b> <b>.<b> Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add up to 200 g more coconut water to desired consistency and blend <b>10 sec/speed 8<b> <b>.<b> Transfer into serving glasses and garnish with extra mint leaves before serving.

hintsAndTricks: This smoothie will keep in the refrigerator for 1 day. Be sure to thoroughly mix before serving (<b>5-10 sec/speed 8<b>).
To make this recipe nut free, replace the walnuts with sunflower seeds.
